comment.author: 78785369@N06
comment._content:
Victor Henry Sylvester Scratchley was married to Anna Clementina (nee Harvey), they had one son, Peter John Scratchley, later Major who lived at Brooms Farm, Edenbridge, Kent.

Gentleman Cadet V H S Scratchley was Commissioned from the Royal Military College as a Second Lieutenant in the KRRC on 25th March 1891.  He was Gazetted his DSO on 19th April 1901.

The KK after his name may refer to service in the Kaapse Korps (South African Cape Corps).

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: FreeBMD Death registered 2nd qr 1936 in Kensington
